snippet: The company, which is estimated to spend $2 billion a year around the world on ads and marketing, said it would hire a dedicated team being assembled by the agency group WPP.
abstract: The company, which is estimated to spend $2 billion a year around the world on ads and marketing, said it would hire a dedicated team being assembled by the agency group WPP.

headline.main: Bank of America Goes With WPP as It Changes Ad Agency Lineup
